alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 11:41PM MST until January 25 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southeastern New Mexico in northern and central Lea County, and the northeast Permian Basin and Western Low Rolling Plains in West Texas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
